metadata.name: Masked Horses
metadata.description:
I made this image of horses in the rural countryside near Tel Aviv. I was told these blindfolds are called fly masks and used to protect their eyes from the flies that swarmed around nearby chicken coops. 

The LOMO camera company sent me a prototype of the LOMO LC-Wide to test on a visit to Israel, before the camera became commercially available. This is one of the resulting photographs that were used to promote the LOMO LCWide's release.
